modName: MaleBengz. Male Voice Replacer Mod and Additional Voices
summary: Replace Maleeventoned voice into Poorly made Indonesian, Japanese, and English Voices by one of my friend. There's also Additional Voices version of this voice.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]Replacer Voice Version

Almost all of the vanilla voices replaced, except Shout that still on progress.


Required [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21215]Additional Player Voice for Skyrim[/url]﻿ for the additional voices version.

on Additional Player Voice version. player will say something if
1. Killing NPC
2. Casting Spell
3. Sneaking

Sound Example : 
1. [url=https://vocaroo.com/i/s1i8sU4oxGUr]Attacking[/url]﻿
2. [url=https://vocaroo.com/i/s1Lnq2PbdZBd]Power Attack[/url]﻿
3. [url=https://vocaroo.com/i/s1WyCObckL22]Getting Attacked[/url]﻿

Sound Example Additional Voices
1. [url=https://vocaroo.com/i/s18TV1dLFkYQ]Casting Spell[/url]﻿
2. [url=https://vocaroo.com/i/s1tp6rcAPBBr]Killing NPC[/url]﻿
3. [url=https://vocaroo.com/i/s1Pkhs8D83Tn]Another Casting Spell Voice[/url]

Installation  use NMM or
1. Extract the archive.
2. Merge the data folder with your Skyrim Data folder.
3. Beware this is a Replacer Mod, so Backup your file before Replacing.

Installation For Additional Player Voice Ver, use NMM or
1. Extract the archive.
2. Merge the data folder with your Skyrim Data folder.
3. Only 3 folder selectable in-game, so rename the folder you want to use into set1/set2/set3 (Default set is on Set2)
4. In-game, enable lesser powers, select set1/set2/set3

[/size][size=3]Uninstall :[/size] [size=3] 
1.Using NMM to uninstall,
2. or Manual just delete the file on Data/sound/voice/skyrim.esm/maleeventoned (for Replacer Ver)
3.  [/size]   [size=3]Disable lesser power, save, quit, uninstall
﻿Delete folder: Data/Sound/fx/nhva
﻿reload savegame[/size][size=3] (For Additional player voice version)       

Credit goes to :   [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4911907]Nanahane[/url]﻿ for making [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21215]Additional Player Voice Mod[/url]


Please Endorsed or Kudos if you want more of this! :D              
[/size]
author: ReolP
